findings.message: canMerge forced false when isAllPass is null (no testing report loaded)
findings.suggestion: Allow merge when no projectId / testing report exists
findings.rejectionReason: By design: 6-layer testing pipeline requires all tests to pass before merge. UI shows clear warning message at lines 325-333. Normal workflow always has projectId.

findings.message: remote-mobile-pwa entry placed outside the projects object, making JSON invalid

rejectionReasons.finding: Stage 5 merge blocking when no projectId
rejectionReasons.reason: By design: testing gate requires report before merge. UI shows warning. Normal flow always has projectId.
